game

Class MamboMarie

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      • game.ZombieActor
        • game.MamboMarie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ActorInterface

    public class MamboMarie
extends ZombieActor
    The "boss" of the game which summons zombies, wander and chant. It does not attack but is a major threat in the map for the player
